featured.text: Abraham Lincoln did the same, but then the inaugural crowds became far too large for the White House to accommodate comfortably, and this also created a security issue.
Public dwellings lined its ground level; a marketplace and two mosques also fit comfortably inside.
We have to find a way to live comfortably inside our body and make friends with and cherish ourselves.

definition.en_def: In a way that provides physical or mental comfort.
definition.example: She settled into the chair comfortably with a book.
